configurations.name: osm_file_path
configurations.description: Path to lanelet2 osm map for a given intersection.

configurations.name: lane_to_lanelet_corr_thres
configurations.description: The lane (MAP) to lanelet (lanelet2 map) correlation threshold in meters. If the average distance between nodes in a lane of the MAP and the centerline of the any existing intersection lanelet described in the lanelet2 map exceeds lanewidth plus this threshold they will not correlate.

configurations.name: host_address
configurations.description: Address to host intersection model REST server.

configurations.name: host_port
configurations.description: Port to host intersection model REST server

configurations.name: map_msg_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic for vehicle status and intent messages

configurations.name: map_msg_group_id
configurations.description: Kafka consumer group for BSM kafka consumer.
